inputs.name: chefCookbookVersion
inputs.label: Cookbook version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number to assign to the cookbook.  By default this uses the BuildNumber, which should be set to be a semantic version number (e.g. 1.0.3)

inputs.label: Metadata file
